items.sentence: Discussing the matter further will get you nowhere.
Does anyone here know what time the meeting starts?
Tom sent a dozen roses to Mary on Valentine\'s Day.
Tom told Mary that he didn\'t believe in astrology.
You\'d better eat everything that\'s on your plate.
I wish the subway wasn\'t so crowded every morning.
I would buy this watch, except it\'s too expensive.
I\'d like you to translate this letter into French.
I\'ve been wanting to do that for a very long time.
If you can\'t make it, call us as soon as possible.
I noticed that Tom was wearing a new pair of shoes.
I often sit on the porch and read in the afternoon.
I only did that because I had nothing better to do.
I only met Tom once, but he seemed like a nice guy.
Tom considers himself to be a citizen of the world.
Tom crossed the river by jumping from rock to rock.
Tom decided to buy a used car instead of a new one.
Tom is one of the best guitar players in Australia.
Tom is the only one who seems to be having any fun.
Tom may be the only one who can solve this problem.
